annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 1102(b) of the Service Improvement and Fiscal Year 2000 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-110, July 28, 1999, 46 DCR 6320).

annoGroup.heading: Resolutions
annoGroup.annotation: Resolution 14-634, the “National Capital Revitalization Corporation Rules Approval Resolution of 2002”, was approved effective December 13, 2002.
